DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare lens centration DAILIES TOTAL1® ( DT1 ) contact lenses 1-DAY ACUVUE® Tru-Eye® ( 1DAVTE ) contact lenses Japanese population 7 ± 2 day wear product .
DOC.brief_title: DAILIES TOTAL1® Lens Centration Japanese Population
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent document . Habitually wear soft contact lenses daily disposable weekly/monthly replacement basis . Symptoms contact lens discomfort define protocol . Require contact lenses within power range ‐0.50 diopter ( D ) ‐10.00 D. Cylinder , present , less equal 0.75D either eye Visit 1 . Vision correctable 20/25 0.1 ( logMAR ) good eye distance pre‐study lenses Visit 1 . Acceptable contact lens fit study contact lenses . Willing wear lens every day least minimum five day per week six hour per day , every day possible attend study visit . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Currently wear DT1 1DAVTE . Ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear . Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator . Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrollment trial . Any moderate severe ocular condition observe slitlamp examination enrollment visit . History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery irregular cornea . Prior refractive surgery ( e.g . LASIK , PRK , etc ) . Monocular subject ( one eye functional vision ) subject fit one lens . Judged ineligible patient clinical study investigator . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
